text: [Music]
welcome peripheral neuropathy is a very
common thing worldwide
this can come from accidents injuries on
the muscles and nerves it can come from
toxins diabetes infections
many things can cause us
burning tingling cramping
aching pain it can radiate the different
parts throughout your body and remember
that these nerves affect muscles
so if the nerve impulses are not working
correctly throughout your body the
muscles can eventually feel weak and
tired so i want to get right to the nuts
and bolts for you
so you can feel better quicker
i have found from many years of practice
with many conditions of neuropathy from
many many many patients
i have found that the b vitamins can do
miracles for many of your problems
now the reason why i say the b vitamins
is because
i find it more wiser and effective to
take a b complex vitamin to make sure
you're getting all the b vitamins rather
than just b1 b6 or b12 those are the
three main vitamins that they found
that are directly tied into neuropathy
but here is the problem if you are
deficient in any other b vitamin because
of poor diet excessive stress
these vitamins all work together
by taking a good b complex and usually
they come b 50s or b 100s but even b 50s
are suffice
preferably you want to take a b complex
that is
time released meaning that you don't
want it to get out of your system too
quick but it will make your p
very yellow so don't panic even though
you're hydrating you'll notice that your
p is very yellow that means you're
getting a lot of assimilation of those b
vitamins now
try to get a time release and if you
cannot at least try to split it up
because you want those b vitamins in
your body give it a couple weeks
you should really see great changes b
vitamins are generally very safe
whatever your body doesn't need you're
going to excrete it your body doesn't
store it like fat soluble vitamins like
vitamin a d e and k
but
try those b vitamins
i really believe it's going to help many
of you but you must have a well-balanced
diet try to exercise the best you can
hydrate get your sleep try to keep the
stress down and i really think that you
will benefit please share this video

it a great day
i'm dr alan mandel
